verses.verse: In the <S%G1161>end<s%> <S%G3796><s%> of the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%>, as it began to <S%G2020>dawn<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> the <S%G3391>first<s%> day of the <S%G4521>week<s%>, <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> to <S%G2334>see<s%> the <S%G5028>sepulchre<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, there <S%G1096>was<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4578>earthquake<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2597>descended<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, and <S%G4334>came<s%> and rolled <S%G617>back<s%> the <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2374>door<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1883>upon<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>. was: or, had been

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G846>His<s%> <S%G2397>countenance<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G796>lightning<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1742>raiment<s%> <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G5616>as<s%> <S%G5510>snow<s%>:
<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G575>for<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> of <S%G846>him<s%> the <S%G5083>keepers<s%> did <S%G4579>shake<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G5616>as<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%> men.

<S%G1161>And<s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto the <S%G1135>women<s%>, <S%G5399>Fear<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> ye <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G4717>crucified<s%>.

He <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> he is <S%G1453>risen<s%>, <S%G2531>as<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%>. <S%G1205>Come<s%>, <S%G1492>see<s%> the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2749>lay<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G5035>quickly<s%>, and <S%G2036>tell<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he is <S%G1453>risen<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, he goeth <S%G4254>before<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>; <S%G1563>there<s%> shall ye <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>: <S%G2400>lo<s%>, I have <S%G2036>told<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G1831>departed<s%> <S%G5035>quickly<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3419>sepulchre<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%>; and did <S%G5143>run<s%> to <S%G518>bring<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G518>word<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> they <S%G4198>went<s%> to <S%G518>tell<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%><S%G2532>,<s%> <S%G2400>behold<s%>, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G528>met<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, All <S%G5463>hail<s%>. <S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G2902>held<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> by the <S%G4228>feet<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G5399>Be<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5399>afraid<s%>: <S%G565>go<s%> <S%G518>tell<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they <S%G5217>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>, and <S%G2546>there<s%> shall they <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when <S%G846>they<s%> were <S%G4198>going<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, <S%G5100>some<s%> of the <S%G2892>watch<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%>, and <S%G518>shewed<s%> unto the chief <S%G749>priests<s%> all the <S%G537>things<s%> that were <S%G1096>done<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> when they were <S%G4863>assembled<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G4245>elders<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> had <S%G2983>taken<s%> <S%G4824>counsel<s%>, they <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G2425>large<s%> <S%G694>money<s%> unto the <S%G4757>soldiers<s%>,

<S%G3004>Saying<s%>, Say <S%G2036>ye<s%><S%G3754>,<s%> <S%G846>His<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> by <S%G3571>night<s%>, and <S%G2813>stole<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> away while <S%G2257>we<s%> <S%G2837>slept<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G191>come<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> the <S%G2232>governor's<s%> <S%G191>ears<s%>, <S%G2249>we<s%> will <S%G3982>persuade<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G275>secure<s%> <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>.

<S%G1161>So<s%> they <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G694>money<s%>, and <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> they were <S%G1321>taught<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3056>saying<s%> is commonly <S%G1310>reported<s%> <S%G3844>among<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3360>until<s%> this <S%G4594>day<s%>.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> the <S%G1733>eleven<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> went <S%G4198>away<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>, <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G3735>mountain<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G5021>appointed<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> when they <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, they <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> some <S%G1365>doubted<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G2980>spake<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> is <S%G1325>given<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%>.

Go <S%G4198>ye<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%>, and <S%G3100>teach<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%>, <S%G907>baptizing<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G3962>Father<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G5207>Son<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%>: teach: or, make disciples, or, Christians of all nations

<S%G1321>Teaching<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> to <S%G5083>observe<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G3745>whatsoever<s%> I have <S%G1781>commanded<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%>, <S%G2400>lo<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3956>alway<s%> <S%G2250><s%>, even <S%G2193>unto<s%> the <S%G4930>end<s%> of the <S%G165>world<s%>. <S%G281>Amen<s%>.
